title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message: Hello guys, i have this Late 2013 that reboots every 15 minutes to 2 hours. Cannot find anything on the logic board all very clean and ASD comes up with nothing. Are there any known issues with these boards this can relate too?

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message:
820-????
I did never bother to memorize board models by year...

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message: Unfortunately, no known solution for this. I remember Duke posting about replacing the CPU VCore Power Circuit with NEW chips as a possibility to fix it. Not sure that is a known solution, but the random reboots on these suck.

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message:
If is 820-3662, dukefawkes seems to got some of them working with no return after replacing (in)famous FDMF chips from CPU power supply.
You can try that too, if get good chips...

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message: Yeah its a 3662, so these are the U7310, 20 and 30 correct?

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message: One thing i forgot to mention, before it does the shutdown, the fan starts spinning high. Thats why i initially thought its some sensor issue but ASD doesnt find any,

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message: Yeah it's def a common issue. You can try and replace them if you can get new chips anything from a donor board is worthless.

title: 15 inch retina late 2013 rebooting
message: Unfortunately only have some donor boards lying around. Replaced all 3 IC and its been running fine now for over 3 hours, so seems to be fixed:). Thanks for the tip!
